DesignerItem.Content: <Image Source="pack://application:,,,/IC.UI;component/Resources/Images/Byte2Hex.png" ToolTip="Преобразует 1 байт в 2 байта." IsHitTestVisible="False" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation" xmlns:s="clr-namespace:System;assembly=mscorlib" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" xmlns:icuiic="clr-namespace:IC.UI.Infrastructure.Controls;assembly=IC.UI.Infrastructure"><Image.Tag><s:Int32>5</s:Int32></Image.Tag><icuiic:DesignerItem.DragThumbTemplate><ControlTemplate><Image Source="pack://application:,,,/IC.UI;component/Resources/Images/Byte2Hex.png" ToolTip="{x:Null}" IsHitTestVisible="True" /></ControlTemplate></icuiic:DesignerItem.DragThumbTemplate><icuiic:DesignerItem.ConnectorDecoratorTemplate><ControlTemplate><icuiic:RelativePositionPanel Margin="-4,-4,-4,-4"><icuiic:Connector Orientation="Left" Position="0,0" Name="Left" icuiic:RelativePositionPanel.RelativePosition="0,0.5" /><icuiic:Connector Orientation="Right" Position="0,0" Name="Right" icuiic:RelativePositionPanel.RelativePosition="1,0.5" /></icuiic:RelativePositionPanel></ControlTemplate></icuiic:DesignerItem.ConnectorDecoratorTemplate></Image>

<Image Source="pack://application:,,,/IC.UI;component/Resources/Images/Bits2Byte.png" ToolTip="Преобразование 1 байта в 8 бит." IsHitTestVisible="False" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation" xmlns:s="clr-namespace:System;assembly=mscorlib" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" xmlns:icuiic="clr-namespace:IC.UI.Infrastructure.Controls;assembly=IC.UI.Infrastructure"><Image.Tag><s:Int32>24</s:Int32></Image.Tag><icuiic:DesignerItem.DragThumbTemplate><ControlTemplate><Image Source="pack://application:,,,/IC.UI;component/Resources/Images/Bits2Byte.png" Tag="{x:Null}" ToolTip="{x:Null}" IsHitTestVisible="True" /></ControlTemplate></icuiic:DesignerItem.DragThumbTemplate><icuiic:DesignerItem.ConnectorDecoratorTemplate><ControlTemplate><icuiic:RelativePositionPanel Margin="-4,-4,-4,-4"><icuiic:Connector Orientation="Left" Position="0,0" Name="Left1" icuiic:RelativePositionPanel.RelativePosition="0,0.2" /><icuiic:Connector Orientation="Left" Position="0,0" Name="Left2" icuiic:RelativePositionPanel.RelativePosition="0,0.4" /><icuiic:Connector Orientation="Left" Position="0,0" Name="Left3" icuiic:RelativePositionPanel.RelativePosition="0,0.6" /><icuiic:Connector Orientation="Left" Position="0,0" Name="Left4" icuiic:RelativePositionPanel.RelativePosition="0,0.8" /><icuiic:Connector Orientation="Top" Position="0,0" Name="Top1" icuiic:RelativePositionPanel.RelativePosition="0.3,0" /><icuiic:Connector Orientation="Top" Position="0,0" Name="Top2" icuiic:RelativePositionPanel.RelativePosition="0.6,0" /><icuiic:Connector Orientation="Bottom" Position="0,0" Name="Bottom1" icuiic:RelativePositionPanel.RelativePosition="0.3,1" /><icuiic:Connector Orientation="Bottom" Position="0,0" Name="Bottom2" icuiic:RelativePositionPanel.RelativePosition="0.6,1" /><icuiic:Connector Orientation="Right" Position="0,0" Name="Right" icuiic:RelativePositionPanel.RelativePosition="1,0.5" /></icuiic:RelativePositionPanel></ControlTemplate></icuiic:DesignerItem.ConnectorDecoratorTemplate></Image>

<Border BorderThickness="2,2,2,2" BorderBrush="#FF000000" Tag="0" ToolTip="Входной блок" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation" xmlns:icuiic="clr-namespace:IC.UI.Infrastructure.Controls;assembly=IC.UI.Infrastructure"><icuiic:DesignerItem.ConnectorDecoratorTemplate><ControlTemplate><icuiic:RelativePositionPanel Margin="-4,-4,-4,-4"><icuiic:Connector Orientation="Bottom" Position="0,0" Name="Bottom" icuiic:RelativePositionPanel.RelativePosition="0.5,1" /><icuiic:Connector Orientation="Left" Position="0,0" Name="Left" icuiic:RelativePositionPanel.RelativePosition="0,0.5" /><icuiic:Connector Orientation="Right" Position="0,0" Name="Right" icuiic:RelativePositionPanel.RelativePosition="1,0.5" /></icuiic:RelativePositionPanel></ControlTemplate></icuiic:DesignerItem.ConnectorDecoratorTemplate><Grid><Grid.RowDefinitions><RowDefinition Height="3*" /><RowDefinition Height="*" /><RowDefinition Height="3*" /></Grid.RowDefinitions><Label HorizontalContentAlignment="Center" IsHitTestVisible="False" Grid.Row="0">Input</Label><TextBox MaxLength="7" HorizontalContentAlignment="Center" IsHitTestVisible="True" Grid.Row="2">[ _ _ ]</TextBox></Grid></Border>

<Border BorderThickness="2,2,2,2" BorderBrush="#FF000000" Tag="1" ToolTip="Выходной блок" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation" xmlns:icuiic="clr-namespace:IC.UI.Infrastructure.Controls;assembly=IC.UI.Infrastructure"><icuiic:DesignerItem.ConnectorDecoratorTemplate><ControlTemplate><icuiic:RelativePositionPanel Margin="-4,-4,-4,-4"><icuiic:Connector Orientation="Top" Position="0,0" Name="Top" icuiic:RelativePositionPanel.RelativePosition="0.5,0" /><icuiic:Connector Orientation="Left" Position="0,0" Name="Left" icuiic:RelativePositionPanel.RelativePosition="0,0.5" /><icuiic:Connector Orientation="Right" Position="0,0" Name="Right" icuiic:RelativePositionPanel.RelativePosition="1,0.5" /></icuiic:RelativePositionPanel></ControlTemplate></icuiic:DesignerItem.ConnectorDecoratorTemplate><Grid><Grid.RowDefinitions><RowDefinition Height="3*" /><RowDefinition Height="*" /><RowDefinition Height="3*" /></Grid.RowDefinitions><Label HorizontalContentAlignment="Center" IsHitTestVisible="False" Grid.Row="0">Output</Label><TextBox MaxLength="7" HorizontalContentAlignment="Center" IsHitTestVisible="True" Grid.Row="2">[ _ _ ]</TextBox></Grid></Border>

<Border BorderThickness="2,2,2,2" BorderBrush="#FF000000" Tag="1" ToolTip="Выходной блок" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation" xmlns:icuiic="clr-namespace:IC.UI.Infrastructure.Controls;assembly=IC.UI.Infrastructure"><icuiic:DesignerItem.ConnectorDecoratorTemplate><ControlTemplate><icuiic:RelativePositionPanel Margin="-4,-4,-4,-4"><icuiic:Connector Orientation="Left" Position="0,0" Name="Left" icuiic:RelativePositionPanel.RelativePosition="0,0.5" /><icuiic:Connector Orientation="Right" Position="0,0" Name="Right" icuiic:RelativePositionPanel.RelativePosition="1,0.5" /></icuiic:RelativePositionPanel></ControlTemplate></icuiic:DesignerItem.ConnectorDecoratorTemplate><Grid><Grid.RowDefinitions><RowDefinition Height="3*" /><RowDefinition Height="*" /><RowDefinition Height="3*" /></Grid.RowDefinitions><Label HorizontalContentAlignment="Center" IsHitTestVisible="False" Grid.Row="0">OutputConst</Label><TextBox MaxLength="7" HorizontalContentAlignment="Center" IsHitTestVisible="True" Grid.Row="2">[Const]</TextBox></Grid></Border>
